revised_title: Erection of the Great Telescope at Melbourne Observatory
tldr: The author provides an update on the progress of erecting a large telescope at Melbourne Observatory. The telescope is expected to be fully functional in two months once the building is completed. The author discusses the materials used for the telescope and the building, as well as other equipment such as micrometers, spectrum-apparatus, magnetographs, and baro-and thermographs. The photography has become a routine part of the observatory's work.
